channel.title: Latest Tutorials on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home
channel.description: Recent content in Latest Tutorials on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home

item.title: Using vRA to deploy vSphere with Tanzu Namespaces & Guest Clusters
item.description: This walk through details the technical configurations for using vRealize Automation to deploy vSphere with Tanzu supervisor namespaces and guest clusters.

item.title: Installing Harbor using VM Operator on vSphere
item.description: vSphere with Tanzu’s latest updates (v 7.0u2a) introduces some exciting features of using Kubernetes to manage the lifecycle of virtual machines.
